predicate.note: Frames file for 'pigeonhole' based on instances from Webtext 2.5-2. VerbNet entry 29.2.

roleset.name: to assign to a definite place in an orderly system

role.descr: agent, person assigning another entity a definite role/place
pigenholed as what? role or position assigned/describing arg 1

example.name: Passive
example.text: Facts show that as long as the two sides are willing to talk, [the issues]-2 will not be pigeonholed *-2.
example.arg: as long as the two sides are willing to talk
